name: Bugbear Bowsmen
description:
FULLSCREEN IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
Try to escape the Bugbear Domain! But be careful... whenever other bugbears take damage, you do too!


Made In 12 Hours For The Mini Jam #111
Limitation: You Are Your Own Enemy
Theme: Colors
Amazing Music By Agent Track
Color Palette
All Art, Code, And Sound Effects Were Created By Myself
